resources.string: Please wait until processing is complete
Sorry, but the recorded speech is not enough for analysis
Sorry, but the total recorded speech length is not enough for analysis
Sorry, but the relative recorded speech length is not enough for analysis
The audio record has too much background noise. Please record in a quieter location
Multiple speakers detected. Please try again
The audio record has strong echo. Please record in an another location
This app needs permissions for operation
Speak about the last movie you watched\nTalk about your recent vacation\nDescribes where you are
Please start talking. For example, about the last movie you watched.
We need 15–30 seconds of continuous speech to create the best voiceprint\nThe good news is that you only need to do this once!
Speech is not live. Synthesized voices can\'t be used for enrollment. Please record again.
Your VoiceSDK license is invalid. To continue using the app, please tap on the \“Renew License\” button below to get in touch with our manager.
Your VoiceSDK license has expired. To continue using the app, please tap on the \“Renew License\” button below to get in touch with our manager.
